{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=WAP6804 |series=AC2100 |fcc_date=09/14/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=MitraStar |type=wireless system |fcc_id=I88WAP6804 |ic_id=2468C-WAP6804 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Quantenna |cpu1_model=QT3860BC;QT3860BC, AA02F2D1, A05510, 1641; |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model= |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W632GU6MB |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3860BC;QT3860BC, AA02F2D1, A05510, 1641; |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B;QT2518B, AA00F1E1, A05139, 1629; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8192EE;RTL8192EE, G7F4GH3, GG34; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211E;RTL8211E, G513M32, GG22B; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=2.4GHz WLAN RF FEM;RFMD (Qorvo);RFFM4203;4203, 3HKQ, 3GB9;2; ,,, 5GHz WLAN RF FEM;Skyworks;SKY85728;SKY85728-11, 624J7, 1624 MY;4; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, TR-069, DFS (master), DFS (slave), |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''2100 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Dual-Band AC2100 Gigabit Wireless Bridge}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.zyxel.com/us/en/products_services/wap6804.shtml}} {{SupportPage|vendor=ZyXEL|region=gb|kbid=M-02807|model=WAP6804}} ''"A key component of '''ZyXEL Multy Pro''' Managed WiFi Solution"'' :[[List of Wireless Systems]] [https://fccid.io/I88WAP6804/Test-Report/Test-Report-3556730 Test Report] document submitted to the FCC contains chip info. {{see also|ZyXEL Armor X1 (WAP6806)|AirTies Air 4830}} DFS (master/client) was added in a C2PC request with the FCC on 10/30/2017 :"This Equipment is prepared for FCC Reassessment, the difference :compared with original is adding DFS band, the product hardwareis :identical and new band is adding through software enabling." Mentioned as "Coming Soon" in the image at the top of the [https://www.zyxel.com/us/en/promotions/promotion_20161020_999854_us_en.shtml WAP6405 PPage] ===See also=== *[[ZyXEL WSQ50]] - ''Multy'' (Router/Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WAP6804]] - ''Multy Pro'' (Range Extender) *[[ZyXEL WAP6806 (Armor X1)|ZyXEL WAP6806]] - ''[[ZyXEL Armor X1 (WAP6806)]]'' *[[ZyXEL WAP6906]] - ''ZyXEL Armor X2'' (Tri-Band) *[[ZyXEL NBG6816]] - ''ZyXEL Armor Z1 (NBG6816)'' *[[ZyXEL NBG6817]] - ''ZyXEL Armor Z2 (NBG6817)'' *[[ZyXEL WAP6405]] - ''WiFi Video Bridge/AP'' • [https://www.zyxel.com/us/en/promotions/promotion_20161020_999854_us_en.shtml PPage] __NOTOC__
